entry.title: Converting raw image to qcow2
entry.content:
So you created a raw format and now you realise that you want a change. Your wishing you just used a more flexible format.

Lucky is super easy to change from raw to almost anything with qcow-img

bash qemu-img convert -f raw -O qcow2 Winblows.img Winblows.qcow2

Piece of piss

qemu-img is a super useful tool allowing you to manipulate heaps of different formats.

bash Supported formats: host_cdrom host_floppy host_device raw nbd parallels qcow2 vvfat vpc bochs dmg cloop vmdk qcow cow
